name: limit
description: limits the results. if limit is bigger than the result, this query will be negated and just return all result

name: sort
description: returns result in ascending or descending alphabetical order.

name: search
description: returns all values that includes or match the query's value

name: color
description: returns all dogs by colors that includes or matched the query's value. space ' ' is converted to underscore "_" and "&" to dash/minus sign "-". Example: "Black_Brown-White" to "Black Brown & White"

name: minLifeExpectancy
description: returns all dogs that has minimum life expectancy of >= query's value

name: maxLifeExpectancy
description: returns all dogs that has maximum life expectancy of <= query's value

name: maleMinHeight
description: returns all dogs that minimun male height are >= to query's value

name: maleMaxHeight
description: returns all dogs that maximun male height are <= to query's value

name: femaleMinHeight
description: returns all dogs that minimun female height are >= to query's value

name: femaleMaxHeight
description: returns all dogs that maximun female height are <= to query's value

name: maleMinWeight
description: returns all dogs that minimun male weight are >= to query's value

name: maleMaxWeight
description: returns all dogs that maximum male weight are <= to query's value

name: femaleMinWeight
description: returns all dogs that minimun female weight are >= to query's value

name: femaleMaxWeight
description: returns all dogs that maximum female weight are <= to query's value
